body.section: Hierarchy ManagedParticipation is a kind of PractitionerParticipation

section.title: Description
section.p: "A participation that will be operated on over time and thus whose state and identity must be managed" - HL7 V3

stentry.p: "The status of the ManagedParticipation. Examples: Pending, active, complete, cancelled" - HL7 V3
